p: Second, recombination analysis was performed while excluding CV-B4 (Fig. 5). The BootScan results showed that EV-B106 and EV-B83 had a strong recombination signal in the 5′ -UTR and VP4 regions when Tibet EV-B83 was used as the query sequence for analysis. In the P2 regions, the EV-B80, EV-B106, and Tibet EV-B83 groups had a smaller range of recombination signals in 2C and 3C, which also verified the above recombination results. The CV-A9 and Tibet EV-B83 groups had a wide range of reorganization, which covered most regions of 2A–2C and 3D and small regions of 3B and 3C.
